name: Panduit
overview:
PANDUIT CORP. manufactures products for wiring and communications applications. It offers cabinets, racks, and cable management products; grounding systems; network components; power over Ethernet systems; wiring ducts; cable management accessories; heat shrink and abrasion protection products; outlet systems; stainless steel cable ties and permanent identification products; zone cabling systems; and cable ties. The company also provides identification and labeling systems; overhead/underfloor cable routing products; surface raceway systems; copper systems; installation tools; physical infrastructure management products; terminals; fiber optic systems; lockout/tagout, and safety and network security solutions; power connectors; and wireless systems. In addition, it offers data center; connected buildings; industrial automation; maintenance, repair, and overhaul; and original equipment manufacturer solutions. The company serves education, finance, government, and transportation industries. PANDUIT CORP. has strategic alliances with Cisco, HP, IBM, Rockwell Automation, Fluke Networks, EMC, and Liebert.

The company was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Tinley Park, Illinois. It has manufacturing facilities in Costa Rica, China, the Netherlands, and Singapore.
